hef.IRCTransport
Class IrcAgent

java.lang.Object
  org.jibble.pircbot.PircBot
      hef.IRCTransport.IrcAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.jibble.pircbot.ReplyConstants
public final class IrcAgent
extends org.jibble.pircbot.PircBot

Represent a player to an IRC server. Every Bukkit player should have one! Every agent will have channels, a player, and an active channel.

Method Detail

getActiveChannel

public String getActiveChannel()
Fetch the active channel. The active channel is the channel that a player will talk in if they don't specify a channel.

Returns:
a string with the active channel name.

onNickChange

protected void onNickChange(String oldNick,
                            String login,
                            String hostname,
                            String newNick)
Nickchange notification handler. This is called when: a: Another agent changes their nick b: when this agent change it's nick. Both these situations are handled.

Overrides:
onNickChange in class org.jibble.pircbot.PircBot
Parameters:
oldNick - the old nick of the changer.
login - the login of the changer (doesn't change)
hostname - the hostname of the changer (doesn't change)
newNick - the new nick of the changer.

                   String sourceHostname,

onServerResponse

protected void onServerResponse(int code,
                                String response)
Handles response codes not handled by pircbot This methods handles irc response codes, slices up the response, and then calls the appropriate method.

Overrides:
onServerResponse in class org.jibble.pircbot.PircBot
Parameters:
code - the irc response code.
response - The message that came with the response

onTopic

protected void onTopic(String channel,
                       String topic,
                       String setBy,
                       long date,
                       boolean changed)
Handles topic responses. Topic responses come in: a: as a response to a topic request b: on channel join c: on topic change Honors muteTopic flag for channel, will clear it as well.

Overrides:
onTopic in class org.jibble.pircbot.PircBot
Parameters:
channel - The channel the topic is set for.
topic - The body of the topic.
setBy - The nick of the topic setter.
date - The date the topic was set.
changed - Is this a new topic?

onUserList

protected void onUserList(String channel,
                          org.jibble.pircbot.User[] users)
UserList Response handler. usually a response to /names. Also occurs on channel join. This will check the muteNames set, and clear it.

Overrides:
onUserList in class org.jibble.pircbot.PircBot
Parameters:
channel - The channel that the response is for
users - The users in the channel.
